attributes.action: The Prime Minister to resign immediately.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has tried in vain for over 2 years to achieve a Brexit deal and has not succeeded. It is time for her to acknowledge that in this time of crisis, this country needs a new leader to change tack.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister.
